titleStmt.title: To the right Honourable the Lords and Commons assembled in the high Court of Parliament the humble repromission and resolution, of the captaines and souldiers of the trained bands, and other inhabitants of the county of Essex.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.O. and G.D. for VVilliam Larnar at the signe of the Bible in Little East cheape,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
